pullRequest.title: Setup firebase ml model downloader directories.

commit.message: Setup firebase ml model downloader directories.

nodes.bodyText: is this file actually needed, please check and remove if not.
Usually main entry points to the SDK have Firebase as prefix, i.e. FirebaseModelDownloader. We might have missed this in API review, worth being consistent though. pls check with the council

If you only need access to FirebaseOptions, consider depending on them directly.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseApp.class))
          
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseOptions.class))
          
      
    
    
  

Context: https://github.com/google/guice/wiki/InjectOnlyDirectDependencies
please add a @hide javadoc comment to this class.

commit.message: Update api file to remove unused field.

nodes.bodyText: You should change this to false until you actually add integration tests. Testlab considers absence of tests as a failure.
